LanguageData.Party_letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} is throwing a party to celebrate {CELEBRATION}! Everyone who goes will gain recreation and social energy, and a lasting positive mood boost.
LanguageData.VSIE_BingeParty_letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} suggests doing a little binge party to celebrate {CELEBRATION}. Be warned - Binge parties can last up to a few hours. Colonists will binge on food and drugs until it is over. Simply draft your colonists to stop them taking part in the binge party.
LanguageData.VSIE_OutdoorParty_letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} suggests having an outdoors party to celebrate {CELEBRATION}. Colonists will go outdoors and have a campfire, and then sit around it and talk.
